item.title: æ¸¸æˆç¿»è¯‘
item.description: Job posted on ProZ.comLanguages: Chinese to Korean, Chinese to Japanese, Chinese to Italian, Chinese to Arabic1. We hope that you have a deep understanding of the target language and literature2. We hope that you have strong patience and are willing to make revisions to the translation based on feedback; The feedback content includes but is not limited to style revisions, minor source language text modifications, etc. (may continue to be revised 2-3 times until the translation meets our requirements)Please provide the information below for us:Language Pair:Native language(Area):Price(Translation / proofreading):Daily Output:CAT Tools:Payment Methods:Personal Skype/ Whatsapp/Wechat:Wether accept test for free:It would be great if you can provide us your CV about your translation's experience and your samples of translations!please make the aplication by e-mail!E-mail: [email removed] __________________________________________________________________1.æˆ‘ä»¬å¸Œæœ›ä½ åœ¨æ¸¸æˆé¢†åŸŸæœ‰ä¸°å¯Œçš„ç»éªŒ2.æˆ‘ä»¬å¸Œæœ›æ‚¨æœ‰å¾ˆå¼ºçš„è€å¿ƒï¼Œå¹¶æ„¿æ„æ ¹æ®åé¦ˆå¯¹ç¿»è¯‘è¿›è¡Œä¿®æ”¹ï¼›åé¦ˆå†…å®¹åŒ…æ‹¬ä½†ä¸é™äºé£æ ¼ä¿®æ”¹ã€å°‘é‡æºè¯­è¨€æ–‡æœ¬ä¿®æ”¹ç­‰ï¼ˆå¯èƒ½ä¼šç»§ç»­ä¿®æ”¹2-3æ¬¡ï¼Œç›´åˆ°ç¿»è¯‘ç¬¦åˆæˆ‘ä»¬çš„è¦æ±‚ï¼‰3.å¦‚æœæ‚¨å¯ä»¥æ¥å—å…è´¹æµ‹è¯•ï¼Œæˆ‘ä»¬å°†ä¼˜å…ˆè€ƒè™‘è¯·ä¸ºæˆ‘ä»¬æä¾›ä»¥ä¸‹ä¿¡æ¯ï¼šè¯­è¨€å¯¹ï¼šä»·æ ¼ï¼ˆç¿»è¯‘/æ ¡å¯¹/LQAï¼‰ï¼šæ—¥äº§é‡ï¼šCATå·¥å…·ï¼šæ¥å—çš„æ”¶æ¬¾æ–¹å¼ï¼šä¸ªäººSkype/Whatsapp/å¾®ä¿¡ï¼šæ˜¯å¦å…è´¹æ¥å—æµ‹è¯•ï¼šæˆ‘ä»¬å¸Œæœ›ä½ èƒ½å¤Ÿå‘æˆ‘ä»¬æä¾›ä½ çš„ç®€å†å’Œç¿»è¯‘æ ·æœ¬ï¼è¯·é€šè¿‡é‚®ç®±ç”³è¯·æ­¤å·¥ä½œï¼é‚®ç®±åœ°å€ï¼š [email removed]
